Keywords: Fantastic Four , Illuminati , Scientist
Real Name: Reed Richards
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
PREVENT YOU FROM HURTING ANYONE ELSE: When an opposing character would move adjacent to Mr. Fantastic, roll a d6. 4: Choose one: That character immediately ends their action -or- after resolutions, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.
ARM LASSO: Plasticity, Giant Reach: 3.

February 17, 2021
Goop
I like him more than the piece from the set. Barrier/Outwit has always been a great combo to outwit their move and attack to block them in. After he's hit he gains that charge/quake/cce w/ giant reach which is also really strong.
